comment: /**  * Gets called by {@link RestTemplate#execute} with an opened {@code ClientHttpRequest}.  * Does not need to care about closing the request or about handling errors:  * this will all be handled by the {@code RestTemplate}.  * @param request the active HTTP request  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */
code: /**  * Gets called by {@link RestTemplate#execute} with an opened {@code ClientHttpRequest}.  * Does not need to care about closing the request or about handling errors:  * this will all be handled by the {@code RestTemplate}.  * @param request the active HTTP request  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */ void doWithRequest(ClientHttpRequest request) throws IOException.
